effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts regular damage. Grounds the target until it leaves battle. Ignores levitation effects and the immunity of flying-type Pokémon.
effect.the_teal_mask: Inflicts regular damage. Grounds the target until it leaves battle. Ignores levitation effects and the immunity of flying-type Pokémon.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Inflicts regular damage. Grounds the target until it leaves battle. Ignores levitation effects and the immunity of flying-type Pokémon.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Grounds the target, and hits even Flying-type or levitating Pokémon.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Grounds the target, and hits even Flying-type or levitating Pokémon.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Grounds the target, and hits even Flying-type or levitating Pokémon.
